detaileddescription.para: Convenience value for purposes where non of CTE types is allowed.
Angle of Arrival mode. Antenna switching done on receiver site.

briefdescription.para: Angle of Departure mode with 1 us antenna switching slots.

detaileddescription.para: Antenna switching done on transmitter site.

briefdescription.para: Angle of Departure mode with 2 us antenna switching slots.

detaileddescription.para: Antenna switching done on transmitter site.
Convenience value that collects all possible CTE types in one entry.
Constant Tone Extension (CTE) types.
Allowed antenna switching slots: 1 us or 2 us
Received PDU had CRC OK
Received PDU had incorrect CRC, but Radio peripheral was able to parse CTEInfo field of the PDU and process sampling of CTE.
Received PDU had incorrect CRC, but Radio peripheral was able to process sampling of CTE in some other way.
There were no sufficient resources to sample CTE.
Possible statuses of PDU that contained reported CTE.
IQ samples report received successfully.
Received PDU without CTE. No valid data in report.
Peer rejected CTE request. No valid data in report.

briefdescription.para: Set or update the Constant Tone Extension parameters for periodic advertising set.

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Enable transmission of Constant Tone Extension for the given advertising set.

detaileddescription.para: Transmission of Constant Tone Extension may be enabled only after setting periodic advertising parameters (bt_le_per_adv_set_param) and Constant Tone Extension parameters (bt_df_set_adv_cte_tx_param).

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Disable transmission of Constant Tone Extension for the given advertising set.

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Enable receive and sampling of Constant Tone Extension for the given sync set.

detaileddescription.para: Receive and sampling of Constant Tone Extension may be enabled only after periodic advertising sync is established.

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Disable receive and sampling of Constant Tone Extension for the given sync set.

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Enable receive and sampling of Constant Tone Extension for the connection object.

simplesect.para: Zero in case of success, other value in case of failure.

briefdescription.para: Disable receive and sampling of Constant Tone Extension for the connection object.

simplesect.para: Zero in case of success, other value in case of failure.

briefdescription.para: Set Constant Tone Extension transmission parameters for a connection.

detaileddescription.para: The function is available if embed:rst:inline :kconfig:`CONFIG_BT_DF_CONNECTION_CTE_TX` is enabled.

simplesect.para: If neither BT_DF_CTE_TYPE_AOD_1US or BT_DF_CTE_TYPE_AOD_2US are set in the bitfield, then the bt_df_conn_cte_tx_param.num_ant_ids and bt_df_conn_cte_tx_param.ant_ids parameters will be ignored.
Zero in case of success, other value in case of failure.

briefdescription.para: Enable Constant Tone Extension request procedure for a connection.

detaileddescription.para: The function is available if embed:rst:inline :kconfig:`CONFIG_BT_DF_CONNECTION_CTE_REQ` is enabled.

simplesect.para: Zero in case of success, other value in case of failure.

briefdescription.para: Disable Constant Tone Extension request procedure for a connection.

detaileddescription.para: The function is available if embed:rst:inline :kconfig:`CONFIG_BT_DF_CONNECTION_CTE_REQ` is enabled.

simplesect.para: Zero in case of success, other value in case of failure.

briefdescription.para: Enable Constant Tone Extension response procedure for a connection.

detaileddescription.para: The function is available if embed:rst:inline :kconfig:`CONFIG_BT_DF_CONNECTION_CTE_RSP` is enabled.

simplesect.para: Zero in case of success, other value in case of failure.

briefdescription.para: Disable Constant Tone Extension response procedure for a connection.

detaileddescription.para: The function is available if embed:rst:inline :kconfig:`CONFIG_BT_DF_CONNECTION_CTE_RSP` is enabled.

simplesect.para: Zero in case of success, other value in case of failure.
